hero.headline: Weave <highlight>captivating visual stories</highlight> from your knowledge graph.
hero.descriptionOnline: OpenStrand connects your datasets, documents, and insights across the cloud so you can explore, visualize, and share in minutes. Generative AI is optional - our manual and statistical tools remain first-class.
hero.descriptionOffline: Run OpenStrand entirely offline with local SQLite storage, statistical analysis, and manual insight tooling. Add generative AI later when you are ready - your workflows keep running without it.

highlights.privacy: Zero trust by design. Your data never leaves your workspace.
highlights.analysis: Statistical exploration & storytelling in a single view.
highlights.generativeOptional: Generative AI is additive - not a requirement.
highlights.offline: Offline-first architecture with seamless sync later.

callout.label: Offline ready
callout.title: Manual & statistical analysis suite
callout.offlineDescription: Clean data, compute descriptive stats, and assemble compelling dashboards even when fully disconnected.
callout.aiTitle: AI overlays when you need them
callout.aiDescription: Bring your own model keys to unlock narration, code generation, and tiered visualizations - without losing control.

features.title: Everything you need to explore, learn, and share knowledge
features.subtitle: Transform fragmented datasets into clear visual narratives with accessibility, privacy, and multilingual support baked in.

analytics.title: Guided visual analytics
analytics.description: Leverage auto-insights, reusable recipes, and rich storytelling canvases to surface the signal.

importers.title: Universal ingest
importers.description: Markdown, CSV, JSON, PDF, media, quizzes, and more - strain everything into the same weave.

pipeline.title: Adaptive pipelines
pipeline.description: A schema-aware engine adapts to new datasets, languages, and locales without painful rework.

tiers.title: Three-tier visuals
tiers.description: Static charts, dynamic exploratory canvases, and AI Artisan code all coexist gracefully.

spiral.title: Spiral learning
spiral.description: Plan spaced repetition, scaffolding, and adaptive study schedules from a single knowledge graph.

multilingual.title: Global by default
multilingual.description: Ship localized experiences across 10+ languages with RTL support and locale-aware content.

privacy.title: Privacy that travels
privacy.description: Granular permissions, BYOK integrations, and compliance tooling keep sensitive data on lock.

manualTools.title: Manual & statistical tools
manualTools.description: Descriptive stats, transformation wizards, and custom editors give you control before AI steps in.
manualTools.descriptionOffline: Every insight workflow is available offline: descriptive stats, transformation wizards, manual editors, and storytelling templates.

showcase.title: Tailor the experience to every audience
showcase.subtitle: Nine distinctive themes ship today with more on deck. Color systems, typography, and micro-interactions adapt on the fly.

design.title: Design precision
design.description: Curated palettes and motion-driven accents keep every dataset presentation on brand.

accessibility.title: Accessible by default
accessibility.description: WCAG AA contrast, high-contrast overrides, and reduced-motion respect user preferences per theme.

ai.title: AI optional
ai.description: Showcase AI Artisan results alongside handcrafted visuals to highlight both paths.

modern.title: Modern
modern.description: Glassmorphism, gradient textures, and gentle motion.

classic.title: Classic
classic.description: Serif elegance with gold accents and editorial structure.

paper.title: Paper
paper.description: Print-inspired layouts, perfect for documentation mode.

aurora.title: Aurora
aurora.description: Nebulous gradients and atmospheric glow for storytelling.

ocean.title: Ocean
ocean.description: Deep blues, wave motion, and coral accents for calm focus.

forest.title: Forest
forest.description: Organic textures with growth animations and earthy hues.

space.title: Space
space.description: Cosmic palettes, parallax stars, and orbit-inspired motion.

cyberpunk.title: Cyberpunk
cyberpunk.description: Neon glows and glitch textures with high-contrast callouts.

minimal.title: Minimal
minimal.description: Whitespace-first, typography-driven experience with a single accent.

pricing.title: Start free, scale as your weave grows
pricing.subtitle: Offline-ready core features keep you productive without AI. Upgrade when you are ready to automate storytelling.

free.name: Local Studio
free.description: Ideal for solo researchers validating ideas offline.
features: CSV, JSON, Markdown, PDF, and media ingestion

pro.name: Professional
pro.description: Unlock tiered visualizations, AI Artisan overlays, and cloud sync.
features: BYOK generative overlays with cost tracking

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Compliance, governance, and tailored AI pipelines for data-heavy teams.
features: Advanced RBAC, audit trails, and GDPR tooling

lowLatency.title: Low-latency insights
lowLatency.description: Fast heuristics keep chart generation under two seconds on typical datasets.

scalable.title: Scales with you
scalable.description: Sync to Supabase or Postgres when you are ready for collaboration.
scalable.descriptionOffline: Stay disconnected as long as you need - sync later without rework.

ai.title: AI is additive
ai.description: Bring your own keys to extend workflows without locking yourself in.
ai.descriptionOffline: No keys? No problem - offline workflows keep shipping value.

testimonials.title: Teams trust OpenStrand for narrative clarity
testimonials.subtitle: From data storytelling to curriculum design, OpenStrand adapts to each audience.

items.quote: "The offline toolkit let us deploy in classrooms without Wi-Fi. Students build narratives with or without AI augmentation."
items.name: Amina Rahman

items.quote: "We migrated from siloed dashboards to strands that explain themselves. The Classic theme sold the story to execs instantly."
items.name: Leo Carter

items.quote: "BYOK controls let us enable generative overlays gradually. Compliance teams loved the governance audit trail."
items.name: Priya Chen

cta.title: Own your knowledge weave from anywhere
cta.subtitle: Spin up the offline client, connect to Supabase, or extend with generative AI - OpenStrand adapts to your workflow.
cta.offlineBadge: Analytics paused in offline mode - privacy guaranteed.
